description: If you’re wanting to carve some turns in style and comfort, look no further than this patterned men’s wool skiing sock. Featuring Shred Shield™ technology to reduce friction from toenails, a wide welt for a secure fit, and an iconic mountain scene for aspirational imagery, these socks will deliver maximum comfort and performance so you can enjoy the day on the slopes without giving thought to your feet.
name: Smartwool Performance Ski Zero Cushion Skication Print Over The Calf Socks - Mens
